name: BATTLE ROYALE: A PUBG Text Adventure
name_original: BATTLE ROYALE: A PUBG Text Adventure
description:
Choose to shoot, stab, or sneak your way through the PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds experience in a new light: as an '80s-esque text adventure game! Can you make the right choices and survive to the end?

*WIP!* In future iterations I would like to include:

  • more of everything: enemies, endings, locations, weapons, and actions
  • illustrated graphics
  • a working looting/inventory system
  • randomized encounters?
